amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $110,000,000 for community oriented policing services and to provide a full offset for such amount.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3256 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3256 proposed by Senator Casey for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S12749; text: CR S12749) To appropriate an additional $110,000,000 for community oriented policing services and to provide a full offset for such amount.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3256 proposed by Senator Casey for Senator Biden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3256 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
